title: Lighter brioche rolls
ingredients: ['25g fresh yeast or 7g dried active baking yeast', '2 tablespoons warm milk', '1 teaspoon sugar', '1 egg', '30ml vegetable oil', '250g fat free plain yoghurt', '500g strong white bread flour', '100g granulated sugar', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 lemon, zested', '1 egg yolk', '3 tablespoons milk']
